title: Ice Cube Interview and More
itunes:title: Ice Cube Interview and More
description:
Thursday 6/22- Today on the show we had OG rap legend Ice Cube come by, where he spoke about the BIG 3 tournament coming up, Tupac, his song “Good Cop Bad Cop and more. Also, instead of Charlamagne giving the usual credit someone deserves for being stupid for “Donkey of the Day’ Uncle Charla gave advice to woman how to properly bag a baller for the NBA Draft, or how he likes to say “Proper Pum Pum Management”. Also, Angela helped some listeners out with “Ask Yee”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 6/22- Today on the show we had OG rap legend Ice Cube come by, where he spoke about the BIG 3 tournament coming up, Tupac, his song “Good Cop Bad Cop and more. Also, instead of Charlamagne giving the usual credit someone deserves for being stupid for “Donkey of the Day’ Uncle Charla gave advice to woman how to properly bag a baller for the NBA Draft, or how he likes to say “Proper Pum Pum Management”. Also, Angela helped some listeners out with “Ask Yee”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
